references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models for image generation, a key concept in generative modeling which is addressed in this paper.

This paper introduced the concept of few-shot learning in language models, which is highly relevant to the field of generative models, as it addresses the challenge of generating data with limited training examples.
This paper is highly relevant as it introduces a method for generative modeling on Riemannian manifolds, which is the central topic of this paper.

references.paper_title: Free-form Flows: Make Any Architecture a Normalizing Flow
references.reason: This paper introduces the free-form flow framework, which is extended in this paper to handle data on manifolds.

references.paper_title: Moser flow: Divergence-based generative modeling on manifolds
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it introduces a method for generative modeling on manifolds using flows, and is directly compared to the method presented in this paper.
